entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending early this evening then clearing. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 early this evening then becoming west 20 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Temperature rising to plus 4 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
